display_information.name: Empathic Proxy
display_information.description: Consolidates mentions, DMs and priority signals into an inbox with LLM-powered action extraction and reply suggestions
display_information.long_description: Empathic Proxy is a Slack-first MVP that helps busy professionals manage their Slack communications more efficiently. It consolidates all mentions, direct messages, and priority channel signals into a unified inbox accessible via the Home tab. The app uses an LLM to automatically extract concise action items and suggest appropriate replies for each message. Users can compose, transform (tone/length), preview, and post replies directly from Slack.
